Global Environment Conservative Society (GECS)

Works on environmental crises to reduce & prevent for the future. For more info, see the link below!!

Global Environment Conservative Society (GECS), a youth-led platform building a social network of people all around the world to make people aware of how a small walk today can be an enormous help tomorrow. Here at Global Environment Conservative Society (GECS), we are making an effort to work on environment-related issues and attempting to solve them through some small efforts including the following: - Cleanup Drives - Environmental Awareness - Providing free workshops and webinars - Conducting research - Organizing events or making attentions on Climate Change
